author: Cortex XSOAR

commands.description: Executes a run of the specified connector. If file based, it will use the most recently uploaded data file.
commands.name: kenna-run-connector

commands.description: Filters fixes by a given set of vulnerability and asset parameters and returns the filtered fixes.
commands.name: kenna-search-fixes

commands.description: Updates the attributes of a single asset.
commands.name: kenna-update-asset

commands.description: Updates the attributes of a single vulnerability.
commands.name: kenna-update-vulnerability

commands.description: Gets vulnerabilities of the specified asset.
commands.name: kenna-get-asset-vulnerabilities

commands.description: Adds a tag to the specified asset.
commands.name: kenna-add-tag

commands.description: Deletes tags from the specified asset.
commands.name: kenna-delete-tag

commands.description: Returns JSON data on all the runs of a given connector.
commands.name: kenna-get-connector-runs

integration.description: Use the Kenna v2 integration to search and update vulnerabilities, schedule a run connector, and manage tags and attributes.
integration.name: Kenna v2

playbook.description: This playbook accepts an asset, then searches for vulnerabilities on that asset using the Kenna integration. If a vulnerability exists, it looks for relevant patches, lets the analyst deploy them and then generates an investigation summary report.
playbook.name: Kenna - Search and Handle Asset Vulnerabilities

description: Use the Kenna v2 integration to search and update vulnerabilities, schedule a run connector, and manage tags and attributes.
name: Kenna
